subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* This variant form is the name of the forty-fourth [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]] ([[𝌱]]), as listed in the ancient text.
* In the {{w|lang=zh|第一批简体字表|first batch}} of {{w|simplified Chinese}} characters (1935), it was proposed for this character to be simplified as {{l|zh|灶}}. The simplification of 竈 to {{l|zh|灶}} was finally {{w|lang=zh|汉字简化方案|approved}} in 1965 in mainland China. Note that in {{w|traditional Chinese}} (Taiwan), this character is classified as a variant form of {{l|zh|灶}}.
